derivation: middle voice from a compound of G2596 (κατοπτρίζομαι) and a derivative of G3700 (κατοπτρίζομαι) (compare G2072 (κατοπτρίζομαι));
strongs_def: to mirror oneself, i.e. to see reflected (figuratively)
outline:
1. to show in a mirror, to make to reflect, to mirror
  2. to look at one's self in a mirror
  3. to behold one's self in a mirror
